00020 
00021 /*------------------------------------------------------------------
00022                             ProviderPtr
00023  ------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00024 
00025 class ProviderPtr : public Linkable<ProviderPtr>
00026 {
00027     public:
00028         ProviderPtr() : m_provider(0), m_refcount(0) {};
00029 
00030         ProviderPtr(Provider * provider) : m_provider(provider), m_refcount(0) {
00031             ASSERT(provider!=0);
00032         }
00033 
00034         virtual ~ProviderPtr() {
00035             ASSERT(m_refcount==0);
00036         }
00037 
00038         BOOLEAN operator == (const ProviderPtr &ptr) const { return (m_provider == ptr.m_provider); }
00039 
00040         Provider * GetProvider() const { return m_provider; }
00041         INT GetId() const { ASSERT(m_provider!=0); return m_provider->GetProviderId(); }
00042         INT GetRefCount() const { return m_refcount; }
00043         void IncRefCount() { m_refcount++; }
00044         void DecRefCount() { m_refcount--; }
00045 
00046     private:
00047         Provider * m_provider;
00048         INT        m_refcount;
00049 };
00050 
00051 typedef ElementList<ProviderPtr> ProviderPtrList;
00052

00059 class MainProvider

00063         MainProvider();
00064 
00066         virtual ~MainProvider();
00067 
00069         void Init();
00070 
00072         virtual Provider * GetProvider(INT providerid);
00073 
00075         BOOLEAN HasProvider(INT providerid) { return GetProvider(providerid)!=0; }
00076 
00078         static BOOLEAN    RegisterGlobalProvider(Provider * provider);
00079 
00082         static BOOLEAN    AcquireGlobalProvider(INT providerid);
00083 
00085         static BOOLEAN    ReleaseGlobalProvider(INT providerid);
00086 
00088         static BOOLEAN    UnregisterGlobalProvider(Provider * provider);
00089

00091         static Provider * GetGlobalProvider(INT columnid);

00095

00097         static BOOLEAN         m_semexisting;
00098         static Semaphore       m_semaphore;
00099         static INT             m_refcount;
00100 };
